Package com.nrifintech.cms.services

Class CartItemService

java.lang.Object
com.nrifintech.cms.services.CartItemService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Validator
@Service public class CartItemService extends Object implements Validator
It takes a list of CartItemUpdateRequest objects, gets the corresponding items from the ItemService, and then creates CartItem objects from the Item objects and the quantity from the CartItemUpdateRequest objects

      public Boolean deleteItem​(Integer id)
